title: Snowdown shop is missing.
body:
Hi, can anyone help me with this problem I'm having ?

[I logged on and found the snowdown shop, after that I logged out.](https://imageshack.com/i/p8TU9XhEj)


[And this is after I logged on agian, the snowdown shop is missing.](https://imageshack.com/i/paf6FMfyj)

It would be great if someone help me to get the snowdown shop back.

replies.body:
Hello everyone,
i just got 25 $ for lol as a chrismas present so i wanted to use them for the shop, 
but after i use the card to get rp the shop was gone. could somebody please help me?
i really wanted two of those skins

Hey MrChampion,

There were some issues with the Snowdown Shop not appearing for some players; however, this issue should be resolved. Are you currently able to access Your Snowdown Shop?

You are not the only one who is having this issue, but i do believe, there is a trigger for it after you play the Snowdown map, as in The Legend of the Poro King...conducting test atm, gonna come back with update.

**UPDATE: It seems that it doesn't have a trigger...idk what's the point with it
